name: Shawn O'Donaghue
description: Shawn’s been all-in on web3 since 2018, with his entire career rooted in the space. He started out at marketing agencies before moving in-house in 2020. Along the way, he’s worked with some amazing teams and even led the token sale of Taraxa, a Layer 1 project. Now, Shawn heads up global marketing at Orbs.
